Pre-Game Insights: A win on Thursday would ensure India qualifying for the semis.
Sri Lanka have had a disappointing outing thus far in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between India and Sri Lanka will be played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.
The live streaming of the game between India and Sri Lanka will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
Others: India will play in Mumbai in a 50-over World Cup match for the first time since lifting the trophy at the venue in 2011.
